section.p: The assessment findings associated with the patient's chest.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11609 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.195"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11597)/@code="NeweExam.25" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11596)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11599), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.118 STATIC (CONF:11598)
NEMSIS Trace: eExam.25
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:11610), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.119 STATIC (CONF:11611)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11597)/@code="NeweExam.25" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11596)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11599), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.118 STATIC (CONF:11598)
NEMSIS Trace: eExam.25
